name: prvlem2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(cprvb(w0), wi(cprvb(w1), cprvb(w2)))
-| wi(cprvb(w0), cprvb(wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(cprvb(wi(w1, w2)), wi(cprvb(w1), cprvb(w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(cprvb(w0), wi(cprvb(w1), cprvb(w2)))
-| wi(cprvb(w0), cprvb(wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(cprvb(wi(w1, w2)), wi(cprvb(w1), cprvb(w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(cprvb(w0), cprvb(wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(cprvb(w0), wi(cprvb(w1), cprvb(w2)))
-| wi(cprvb(wi(w1, w2)), wi(cprvb(w1), cprvb(w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

|- wi(cprvb(w0), wi(cprvb(w1), cprvb(w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

comment: An elementary property of the provability predicate. (Contributed by BJ, 3-Apr-2019.)
